
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define si(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define pri(x) printf("%d",x)
#define sll(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pll(x) printf("%lld",x)
#define sstr(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define pstr(s) printf("%s",s)
#define nl printf("\n")
#define ll long long int

int main()
{
    int t;
    si(t);
    while(t--) {
	int n,k;
	si(n); si(k);
	char s[n][12];
	for(int i=0;i<n;++i) {
	    sstr(s[i]);
	}
	int cnt[26]={0};
	int g[n];
	memset(g,0,sizeof(g));
	memset(cnt,0,sizeof(cnt));
	for(int i=n-1;i>=0;--i) {
	    if(!cnt[s[i][strlen(s[i])-1]-'a']) {
		g[i]=1;
		cnt[s[i][0]-'a']++;
	    }
	    if(i+k<n && g[i+k]) {
		cnt[s[i+k][0]-'a']--;
	    }
//	    cout<<g[i]<<" ";
	}
	bool w=false;
	for(int i=0;i<min(n,k);++i) {
//	    cout<<g[i]<<" ";
	    if(g[i]) {
		w=true;
		break;
	    }
	}
	if(w)
	    cout<<"Alex\n";
	else
	    cout<<"Bob\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
